data.message: Wow talking about LOSE YOUR SELF ! What has this guy become ? Used to be one of the best rap artist ever and now you might as well put him in the class with the trash rap that is today! I just can't believe that he lost himself due to money. No more fight in him no more strident to be the best whatever happened to The Eminem in The Slim Shady LP? That is the real Eminem! Super sad
